titleStmt.title: An answer to a printed letter to Dr. W.P. concerning non-resistance and other reasons for not taking the Oathes with some queries to the non-swearers in a postscript.
titleStmt.author: Payne, William, 1650-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for Brabazon Aylmer,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Payne. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
